question.text: <math><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></math> reacts with <math><mi mathvariant="normal">X</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msub></math> and <math><mi mathvariant="normal">X</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></msub></math> to form ionic compounds <math><mfenced close="]" open="[" separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">X</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><msubsup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow><mrow><mo>+</mo></mrow></msubsup></mrow></mfenced><mfenced mathvariant="normal">F</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow><mrow><mo>-</mo></mrow></msubsup></mrow></mfenced></math> and <math><mfenced close="]" open="[" separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">X</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><msubsup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow><mrow><mo>+</mo></mrow></msubsup></mrow></mfenced><mfenced close="]" open="[" separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><msubsup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow><mrow><mo>-</mo></mrow></msubsup></mrow></mfenced></math> then molecular shape of <math><mfenced close="]" open="[" separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">X</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><msubsup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow><mrow><mo>+</mo></mrow></msubsup></mrow></mfenced></math> ion and <math><mfenced close="]" open="[" separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">X</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><msubsup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow><mrow><mo>+</mo></mrow></msubsup></mrow></mfenced></math> ion respectively

solution.text:
The shapes of these ions are as follows

[XeF3+]:  Bent-T shape ( sp3d -hybridisation)

[XeF5+]:  Square pyramidal ( sp3d2 -hybridisation)
